title: Climate and Nature Fund Act 2024 (No. 16 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure, 
Climate and Nature Fund Act 2024 (Section 36) (Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited future ireland fund infrastructure climate nature fund act 2024 (section 36) (commencement) order 2025

title: Climate and Nature Fund Act 2024 (No. 16 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 1st day of August 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 36
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of August 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 36 

of the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure, Climate and Nature Fund Act 
2024 (No. 16 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 July, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [354] 3
